text: heliri; nanantu, allahanu icchisade, svatah nanage yavude labha athava nastavannuntumaduva adhikara ullavanalla. Ondu vele nanage gupta visayagala jnana iddiddare nanu bhari pramanadalli olitannu (sampattannu) sangrahisuttidde mattu yava haniyu nanage sambhavisuttiralilla. Nanu, eccarike niduva mattu nambuvavarige subhavarte niduva kevala obba manusyanallade berenadaru agiruvene
